topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555fdf4163687234be1f0b00#post_555fdf4163687234be1f0b00
Making Karel an adult for one. One of the biggest driving forces of Supergirls character is her immaturity. She has a habit of misusing her powers for her own personal gain. Why the fuck is she a child when she leaves Krypton and yet her cousin who left the planet as an infant WHILE THE PLANET WAS FUCKING EXPLODING is older than her on Earth? Why is there this dumb sister? Karel was raised by Ma and Pa Kent. THAT IS A FUCKING S YOU STUPID FUCKING TWAT!
